name: Sniper Shooter Critical Strike:Super Gun Shooting battle game
name_original: Sniper Shooter Critical Strike:Super Gun Shooting battle game
description:
Aim and shoot the terrorist, accomplish missions to become a Master Hitman.

Sniper Shoot:Counter Strike or we should say Death Sniper: Sniper Shooting is one of the most popular sniper vs sniper and sniper vs terrorist killer games.
Pull the trigger, take out your targets and kill enemies in COUNTER SHOOTER STRIKE, an action-packed, fast and bloody fps game. The effectivestly way to shoot the others is by accurate head shots. Survive as long as you can to complete missions.
In Death Sniper, you have to fight against very dangerous and intelligent terrorists and terrible criminals who are occupied over a city petrol / gas station. They are equipped with high quality weapons, intelligence control system and Walkie-Talkie.

Just take your weapon and fight fun!

--------------Game Features------------
- Game leaderboards and achievements
- 5 different world locations
- 10 Types of Weapons
- Awesome and stunning graphics
- Fun and addictive game-play
- Controls are more responsive
